document_data.name: ''Animating door''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''animating door''''' was a type of [[dweomered door]] that would temporarily bring to life any corpse that was brought through its threshold, as per the [[spell]] ''[[animate dead]]''. Depending on the level of decomposition of the deceased person or creature, it could be brought back as a [[skeleton]] or [[zombie]] version of its previous self.
document_data.Creation: ''Animating doors'' were created with use of the ''animate dead'' spell.
